text: János Berecz (18 September 1930 - 7 July 2022) was a Hungarian politician, writer and journalist. He was born in Ibrány, Hungary. His best known written work as Counter-revolution with pen and gun 1956. He was a member of the Hungarian Socialist Workers' Party. Berecz was a member of the National Assembly between 1985 to 1990. Berecz died on 7 July 2022 in Budapest, Hungary at the age of 91.Meghalt Berecz János, a Kádár-korszak egyik legbefolyásosabb politikusa ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Hungarian politicians Category:Political writers Category:Hungarian journalists
